item.title: Why Does Everyone Think We’re Living in a Paul Verhoeven Movie?
item.description: People often compare imagery of the Trump administration to films like ‘Starship Troopers’ and ‘Total Recall.’ What comfort does the analogy offer?

item.title: How Intense Should Love Really Be? We Want to Hear Your Thoughts.
item.description: Have you ever been called a “love addict?” Ever suspected somebody else was?

item.title: Do I Have to Take Over the Family Company if I Can’t Stand My Cousin?
item.description: I can’t picture spending the rest of my career working with him.

item.title: Is It OK to ‘Teach a Lesson’ to Strangers?
item.description: A ruling on a mother’s curious locker-room practice.

item.title: The Wellness Guru Jay Shetty Has Raised Some Doubts. Including His Own.
item.description: The self-help influencer on his values, his journey and criticism of his work.

item.title: We’re the Guardians of a Difficult Teenager. What Do We Owe Them?
item.description: I’ve found myself carrying negative feelings that I don’t want but can’t quite shake.

item.title: International Oscar Favorites Are Offering a Complicated New View of America
item.description: The Oscars has become friendlier to non-English language movies. And the movies seem aware of their American audiences.

item.title: Do I Have to Watch a Show I Dislike With My Son?
item.description: A ruling on a dispute over quality time.

item.title: Maggie Gyllenhaal on Envy, Rage and Reaching Out to Her Brother
item.description: With a big budget and a lot to say, the filmmaker is unleashing her inner monster with “The Bride!”

item.title: My Aging Mother Won’t Stop Driving. Should I Take Away Her Keys?
item.description: The D.M.V. has suspended her license and she’s irate, blaming us.

item.title: They Fought for the C.I.A. in Afghanistan. In America, They’re Living in Fear.
item.description: A shooting in Washington, D.C., threw their immigration status into jeopardy — and brought attention to a long-hidden dimension of America’s war.

item.title: Should I Tell People What My Principal Did?
item.description: He was a community pillar with a dark underside and possibly other victims.

item.title: Why Are So Many Teen Girls Still Tearing Their A.C.L.s?
item.description: For years, ligament tears have been a crisis among young athletes — even though a few simple exercises can prevent them.
